name: Trifox DollarStore Edition
description:
Small Game made in Unity as a final assignment for my Platform Development 2 Course at Digital Arts & Entertainment (Howest). This project was made to copy the first part of the real game Trifox. the sond effects and OST are taken from the DonkyKong games series.

The game is very short and won't take you more than 5 mins to complete.

Controller Suggested
